      • verifySSL

        public CouchDB verifySSL(String yesOrNo)
        If you are using SSL to connect, this specifies whether the certificate should be verified. Useful when a client has a self-signed certificate for development. Possible values are: yes no
        Returns:
        this

      • format

        public CouchDB format(CouchDB.CouchDBFormat format)
        The output format for your data: basic_interaction_meta - The current default format, where each payload contains only basic interaction JSON document. full_interaction_meta - The payload is a full interaction with augmentations. Take a look at our Sample Output for Database Connectors page.
        Returns:
        this
